text: (allahuveatâ€Œ) pankucerttavar tannal pankalikalakkiyirunnavare (paraleakatt veccâ€Œ) kantal iprakaram parayum: nannalute raksitave, ninakku purame nannal vilicc prart'thikkaruntayirunna nannalute pankalikalanivar. appeal avar (pankalikal) avarkk nalkunna marupati tirccayayum ninnal kallam parayunnavarakunnu enna vakkayirikkum
